original_text: The children of Merari by their families had out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
korean_text: 므라리 자손들은 그 가족대로 르우벤 지파와 갓 지파와 스불론 지파 중에서 열두 성읍을 받았더라

sentences.original_text: The children of Merari by their families
had out of the tribe of Reuben
and out of the tribe of Gad
and out of the tribe of Zebulun
